trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Burlington
There were no other sightings in Burlington on or around October 9th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsThe leap-frogging lights over Lake Ontario as previously reported have a terrestrial explanation. During the evening and night of the date in question, a MAYDAY transmission was received by Canadian Coast Guard on Lake Ontario. Ships as well a Search and Rescue aircraft were dispatched to the area on the extreme east-end of Lake Ontario. During the time of the search, some 70 flares were dropped from aircraft. These flares descend via parachute allowing them to illuminate the area for several minutes at a time. The observer was simply seeing these flares descend.
